Description: Classroom teachers are needed at American and international schools throughout the world. Candidates must be certified in their subject and have a minimum of two years classroom experience. Ideal candidates have a passion for teaching, a strong sense of adventure, a love of international travel, embrace diversity, and have a strong desire to learn and participate in other cultures.Benefits: Travel Allowance to school Housing or Housing Allowance Baggage Allowance Medical Insurance Children Tuition Fee Subsidy GeneralQualifications:- Native English speaker or high level of fluency in English- Holder of Bachelor Degree in subject area or Education, or Post Graduate Certificate/Diploma in Education- Possess the relevant training in the subject or areas that will be teachingMaterials to be sent: To find out about this job and hundreds of other international teaching jobs at: http://www.tieonline.comJob Details
